tasks.title: Establish Annotation Style Guide
tasks.description: Define and document a unified Chinese annotation style and JSDoc format for the entire codebase.
tasks.details: Draft a markdown document outlining annotation conventions, including file headers, function/class JSDoc, inline comments, and dependency notes. Ensure examples use Chinese, avoid excessive technical jargon, and provide analogies where possible.
tasks.testStrategy: Peer review the style guide with at least two developers to ensure clarity and completeness.

subtasks.title: Research JSDoc Standards and Chinese Documentation Practices
subtasks.description: Investigate existing JSDoc standards, Chinese technical documentation conventions, and best practices for bilingual code documentation to establish foundation knowledge.
subtasks.details:
Review official JSDoc documentation, analyze popular Chinese open-source projects for annotation patterns, and identify effective approaches for combining technical accuracy with Chinese language clarity. Document findings and recommendations.

subtasks.title: Define File Header Templates and Conventions
subtasks.description: Create standardized file header templates that include purpose, dependencies, usage examples, and metadata in Chinese with clear formatting guidelines.
subtasks.details:
Establish file header structure including author, creation date, purpose description, dependency listing, and usage examples. Create templates for different file types (components, utilities, types) with Chinese descriptions and consistent formatting.

subtasks.title: Create Function and Class Annotation Standards with Chinese Examples
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive JSDoc standards for functions and classes with Chinese descriptions, parameter documentation, and practical code examples.
subtasks.details:
Define JSDoc format for functions including Chinese parameter descriptions, return value documentation, usage examples, and error handling notes. Create class annotation standards with Chinese property descriptions and method documentation. Include real code examples from the project.

subtasks.title: Establish Inline Comment Guidelines and Technical Analogy Framework
subtasks.description: Create guidelines for inline comments using Chinese language with technical analogies to explain complex logic and compile complete style guide document.
subtasks.details:
Define when and how to use inline comments, establish analogy framework for explaining technical concepts in accessible Chinese, create guidelines for avoiding excessive jargon. Compile all standards into comprehensive markdown document with examples and review checklist.

tasks.title: Setup Annotation Progress Tracking
tasks.description: Implement a comprehensive progress tracking system for annotation tasks with complete file status monitoring and project management framework.
tasks.details: Establish a complete file status tracking mechanism that includes comprehensive scanning of the src directory, analysis of existing annotation states, creation of file dependency relationship mapping, establishment of progress tracking data structures, and setup of status reporting mechanisms. This will provide a complete project management framework for systematic annotation work.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the tracking system accurately identifies all files in src directory, correctly analyzes existing annotation status, properly maps file dependencies, maintains accurate progress data structures, and provides real-time status reporting updates.

subtasks.title: Comprehensive src Directory File Scanning
subtasks.description: Implement complete scanning mechanism for all files in the src directory to establish baseline inventory

subtasks.title: Existing Annotation Status Analysis
subtasks.description: Analyze current annotation state of all discovered files to understand existing documentation coverage

subtasks.title: File Dependency Relationship Mapping
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive mapping of file dependencies to understand annotation priority and sequence requirements

subtasks.title: Progress Tracking Data Structure Implementation
subtasks.description: Establish robust data structures to maintain file status, annotation progress, and dependency information

subtasks.title: Status Reporting Mechanism Setup
subtasks.description: Implement real-time status reporting system to provide visibility into annotation progress and project status

tasks.title: Annotate Type Definitions (src/types/)
tasks.description: Add comprehensive file headers and JSDoc comments to all type definition files.
tasks.details: For each file in src/types/, add a file-level comment describing its purpose, dependencies, and usage. Annotate all exported types and interfaces with JSDoc, using Chinese and providing examples where relevant.
tasks.testStrategy: Run JSDoc tool to ensure all types are documented; spot-check for clarity and completeness.

tasks.title: Annotate Constants (src/constants/)
tasks.description: Document all constants and configuration values with clear Chinese comments.
tasks.details: Add file headers to each file in src/constants/. For each constant, provide a JSDoc comment explaining its meaning, usage, and any dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all constants are annotated and that documentation is generated correctly.

tasks.title: Annotate Tool System Interface (src/Tool.ts)
tasks.description: Provide detailed file and interface/class-level annotations for the core tool interface.
tasks.details: Add a file header explaining the architectural role of Tool.ts. Use JSDoc to annotate all interfaces, types, and classes, including generics and async functions. Highlight integration with the permission system.
tasks.testStrategy: Review generated documentation for completeness and clarity; ensure all exported members are annotated.

tasks.title: Annotate Config Management (src/utils/config.ts)
tasks.description: Document the configuration management logic and its dependencies.
tasks.details: Add a file header describing the config system's responsibilities. Annotate all exported functions and configuration schemas with JSDoc, including parameter and return types.
tasks.testStrategy: Run JSDoc and verify that all config-related APIs are documented and understandable.

tasks.title: Annotate Model Management (src/utils/model.ts)
tasks.description: Add annotations to model management logic, focusing on AI model switching and integration.
tasks.details: Provide a file header and JSDoc for all functions and classes. Explain the data flow and dependencies with other modules.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all model management APIs are documented and that the documentation is clear to new developers.

tasks.title: Annotate Permission System (src/permissions.ts)
tasks.description: Document the permission management logic and its integration points.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all permission-related functions and types. Explain how permissions are checked and enforced.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all permission APIs are documented and that the documentation covers integration scenarios.

tasks.title: Annotate Claude AI Service (src/services/claude.ts)
tasks.description: Provide comprehensive annotations for the Claude AI integration service.
tasks.details: Add a file header describing the service's role, dependencies, and design pattern (adapter). Annotate all functions, especially those handling API calls, streaming, and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for clarity on API usage and integration points.

tasks.title: Annotate Model Adapter Factory (src/services/modelAdapterFactory.ts)
tasks.description: Document the multi-model adapter logic and its extension points.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all exported functions and classes. Explain how new models can be integrated.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that documentation covers extension and integration scenarios.

tasks.title: Annotate MCP Client (src/services/mcpClient.ts)
tasks.description: Add annotations for the MCP protocol integration client.
tasks.details: Provide a file header and JSDoc for all client methods, focusing on protocol handling and error recovery.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all public APIs are documented and that protocol flows are clear.

subtasks.title: Document MCP Protocol Implementation and Integration Patterns
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive file header and JSDoc documentation for MCP protocol implementation details, connection patterns, and integration approaches used in the client.
subtasks.details: Create detailed file header explaining MCP protocol version, supported features, and overall architecture. Document integration patterns, protocol handshake flows, and message serialization/deserialization methods with JSDoc annotations.

subtasks.title: Annotate Client Connection and Session Management Methods
subtasks.description: Add JSDoc annotations for all connection establishment, session lifecycle, and state management methods in the MCP client.
subtasks.details: Document connection initialization, authentication flows, session persistence, reconnection logic, and state synchronization methods. Include parameter descriptions, return types, and usage examples for all session management APIs.

subtasks.title: Document Error Recovery and Retry Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive JSDoc documentation for error handling, recovery strategies, and retry mechanisms implemented in the MCP client.
subtasks.details: Document error classification, recovery procedures, exponential backoff strategies, circuit breaker patterns, and fallback mechanisms. Include JSDoc for all error handling methods with examples of recovery scenarios.

subtasks.title: Create Protocol Flow Diagrams with JSDoc Examples
subtasks.description: Generate protocol flow documentation and comprehensive JSDoc examples demonstrating typical client-server interaction patterns.
subtasks.details: Create ASCII diagrams or detailed comments showing message flow patterns, request-response cycles, and error scenarios. Provide complete JSDoc examples for common use cases, including initialization, method calls, and error handling workflows.

tasks.title: Annotate Message Context Manager (src/utils/messageContextManager.ts)
tasks.description: Document the logic for managing conversation context.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all context management functions. Explain data flow and state management.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all context APIs are documented and understandable.

tasks.title: Annotate Tool Registration System (src/tools.ts)
tasks.description: Document the tool registration and export logic.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all registration functions. Explain how tools are registered, discovered, and exported.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that documentation covers registration flows and extension points.

tasks.title: Annotate Tool Prompts (src/tools/*/prompt.ts)
tasks.description: Add annotations to prompt definition files for each tool.
tasks.details: For each prompt.ts, add a file header and JSDoc for all prompt templates and helper functions.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all prompts are documented and that usage examples are provided.

tasks.title: Annotate Tool Implementations (src/tools/*/*.tsx)
tasks.description: Document the implementation of each tool, focusing on business logic and dependencies.
tasks.details: For each tool implementation file, add a file header, JSDoc for all classes/functions, and inline comments for complex logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Spot-check documentation for clarity and completeness; ensure all exported members are annotated.

tasks.title: Annotate Task Tool (src/tools/TaskTool/)
tasks.description: Add detailed annotations to the agent task system implementation.
tasks.details: Provide file headers and JSDoc for all classes, functions, and types in TaskTool. Explain task flow and agent coordination.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for clarity on task orchestration and extension.

subtasks.title: Document Task Orchestration Architecture and Agent Coordination Patterns
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the task orchestration system architecture, including agent coordination patterns, workflow management structures, and inter-component communication protocols within the TaskTool system.
subtasks.details: Add file headers and JSDoc annotations to core orchestration classes, document agent coordination patterns including task delegation and result aggregation, explain workflow management structures, and provide architectural diagrams in comments for complex coordination flows.

subtasks.title: Annotate Task Lifecycle Management and State Transitions
subtasks.description: Document the complete task lifecycle from creation to completion, including all state transitions, status management, and persistence mechanisms used throughout the task execution process.
subtasks.details: Add JSDoc for task state management classes, document all possible task states and transition conditions, explain persistence mechanisms and data structures, and provide examples of lifecycle flows for different task types.

subtasks.title: Document Inter-Agent Communication Protocols
subtasks.description: Create detailed annotations for all communication protocols used between agents, including message formats, response handling, synchronization mechanisms, and error propagation patterns.
subtasks.details: Document message passing interfaces with JSDoc, explain synchronization and coordination protocols, annotate error handling and recovery mechanisms, and provide examples of typical communication flows between different agent types.

subtasks.title: Annotate Task Execution Engine and Error Handling
subtasks.description: Provide comprehensive documentation for the task execution engine, including execution strategies, resource management, error handling mechanisms, and recovery procedures for failed tasks.
subtasks.details: Add JSDoc to execution engine classes and methods, document error handling strategies and recovery mechanisms, explain resource allocation and cleanup procedures, and provide examples of error scenarios and their resolution.

subtasks.title: Create Comprehensive Examples of Task Flow Scenarios
subtasks.description: Develop detailed documentation with practical examples showing complete task flow scenarios, from simple single-agent tasks to complex multi-agent coordination workflows, including edge cases and error scenarios.
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive JSDoc examples for common task patterns, document complex multi-agent workflows with step-by-step explanations, provide edge case handling examples, and include troubleshooting guides for common issues in task execution flows.

tasks.title: Annotate File Edit Tool (src/tools/FileEditTool/)
tasks.description: Document the file editing tool logic and its integration points.
tasks.details: Add file headers and JSDoc for all classes and functions. Explain editing flows and permission checks.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all editing APIs are documented and that permission integration is clear.

tasks.title: Annotate Bash Tool (src/tools/BashTool/)
tasks.description: Add annotations to the shell command execution tool.
tasks.details: Provide file headers and JSDoc for all classes and functions. Explain command execution flow and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all command APIs are documented and that error scenarios are covered.

tasks.title: Annotate Search Tools (src/tools/GrepTool/, src/tools/GlobTool/)
tasks.description: Document the code search tools and their usage.
tasks.details: Add file headers and JSDoc for all classes and functions in GrepTool and GlobTool. Explain search logic and result formatting.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all search APIs are documented and that usage examples are provided.

tasks.title: Annotate Message Components (src/components/messages/)
tasks.description: Add annotations to all message display components.
tasks.details: For each component, add a file header and JSDoc for props, state, and key methods. Explain rendering logic and data flow.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all message components are documented and that prop types are clear.

tasks.title: Annotate Permission Components (src/components/permissions/)
tasks.description: Document the UI components for permission requests.
tasks.details: Add file headers and JSDoc for all components. Explain user interaction flows and integration with the permission system.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all permission components are documented and that user flows are clear.

tasks.title: Annotate Config Component (src/components/Config.tsx)
tasks.description: Add annotations to the configuration management UI component.
tasks.details: Provide a file header and JSDoc for all props, state, and methods. Explain configuration editing and validation logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all config component APIs are documented and that usage is clear.

tasks.title: Annotate Model Selector Component (src/components/ModelSelector.tsx)
tasks.description: Document the model switching UI component.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all props, state, and methods. Explain model selection flow and integration with model management.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all model selector APIs are documented and that integration points are clear.

tasks.title: Annotate Main Interface (src/screens/REPL.tsx)
tasks.description: Add comprehensive annotations to the main interactive interface.
tasks.details: Provide a file header and JSDoc for all classes, functions, and hooks. Explain data flow, event handling, and integration with services.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that all REPL APIs are documented and that user flows are clear.

tasks.title: Annotate CLI Entry Point (src/entrypoints/cli.tsx)
tasks.description: Document the application entry point and its initialization logic.
tasks.details: Add a file header and JSDoc for all functions and classes. Explain startup sequence, argument parsing, and main event loop.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all entry point logic is documented and that startup flow is clear.
